metadata.title: CVE-2020-35636 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsing functionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1 in Nef_S2/SNC_io_parser.h SNC_io_parser::read_sface() sfh->volume() OOB read. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to an out-of-bounds read and type confusion, which could lead to code execution. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.note: sbeattie> possible regression introduced by fix, see GH issue 5514

criterions.comment: cgal package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
